desc: This version includes new features and several quality-of-life improvements.
notes: - Added ability to disable informative notifications./n- You can now save wallpapers to the Files app./n- You can now freeze the current wallpaper from the save wallpaper option./n- Added the refresh wallpaper option back due to confusion./n- Updated disable UI./n- Replaced some alerts with notifications to minimize clicks./n- Clarified parts of the instructions./n- Removed leftover data from the code./n- Small optimizations to reduce shortcut size./n- Bug fixes.
